original_text: Were not the Ethiopians and the Libyans a huge army with very many chariots and horsemen? Yet because you relied on the Lord, he gave them into your hand.
korean_text: 구스 사람과 룹 사람의 군대가 크지 아니하며 말과 병거가 심히 많지 아니하더이까 그러나 왕이 여호와를 의지하였으므로 여호와께서 왕의 손에 넘기셨나이다

sentences.original_text: Were not the Ethiopians and the Libyans
with very many chariots and horsemen?
Yet because you relied on the Lord,
he gave them into your hand.
